name: ListVendorPayments
description:
Fetch all payments made to vendors.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of all vendor payments. It helps manage and track financial transactions with vendors.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization whose vendor payments you want to list.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: vendor_name_query
parameters.description: Search payments by vendor name using parameters like startswith or contains.

value_schema.description: Search payments by vendor name. Variants: vendor_name_startswith and vendor_name_contains.

parameters.name: search_by_reference_number
parameters.description: Search payments using the reference number. Supports variants: 'startswith' and 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Search payments by reference number. Variants: reference_number_startswith and reference_number_contains. In refunds, reference number for the refund recorded.

parameters.name: payment_number_search
parameters.description: Search payments using the payment number with options for exact match, starts with, or contains.

value_schema.description: Search with Payment Number. Variant: payment_number_startswith, payment_number_contains

parameters.name: payment_date_filter
parameters.description: Specify the date for payment filtering. Use variants like 'date_start', 'date_end', 'date_before', and 'date_after'.

value_schema.description: Date the payment is made. Search payments by payment made date. Variants: date_start, date_end, date_before and date_after.

parameters.name: payment_amount_filter
parameters.description: Filter payments by amount paid to the vendor. Use variants: 'less_than', 'less_equals', 'greater_than', 'greater_equals' to specify the condition.

value_schema.description: Payment amount made to the vendor. Search payments by payment amount. Variants: amount_less_than, amount_less_equals, amount_greater_than and amount_greater_equals. In refunds, Amount refunded from the vendor payment.

parameters.name: search_by_payment_mode
parameters.description: Search payments by payment mode using variants like 'startswith' or 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Search payments by payment mode. Variants: payment_mode_startswith and payment_mode_contains.

parameters.name: search_with_payment_notes
parameters.description: Search payments using notes with options like startswith or contains.

value_schema.description: Search with Payment Notes. Variant: notes_startswith, notes_contains

parameters.name: vendor_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the vendor, used to search payments by vendor ID.

value_schema.description: ID of the vendor. Search payments by vendor id.

parameters.name: last_modified_time_filter
parameters.description: Filter vendor payments by their last modified time. Use a date-time string in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Search with the Last Modified Time of the Vendor Payment

parameters.name: search_payments_by_bill_id
parameters.description: Search payments using the specific Bill ID associated with the transaction.

value_schema.description: Search payments by Bill ID.

parameters.name: search_by_description
parameters.description: Search payments by description. Use 'description_startswith' or 'description_contains' variants for specific matches.

value_schema.description: Search payments by description. Variants: description_startswith and description_contains.

parameters.name: filter_payment_mode
parameters.description: Filter payments by payment mode. Options include All, Check, Cash, BankTransfer, Paypal, CreditCard, GoogleCheckout, Credit, Authorizenet, BankRemittance, Payflowpro, and Others.

value_schema.description: Filter payments by mode. Allowed Values: PaymentMode.All, PaymentMode.Check, PaymentMode.Cash, PaymentMode.BankTransfer, PaymentMode.Paypal, PaymentMode.CreditCard, PaymentMode.GoogleCheckout, PaymentMode.Credit, PaymentMode.Authorizenet, PaymentMode.BankRemittance, PaymentMode.Payflowpro and PaymentMode.Others.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search for payments using reference number, vendor name, or payment description.

value_schema.description: Search payments by reference number or vendor name or payment description.

parameters.name: sort_payments_by
parameters.description: Sort payments by column. Options: vendor_name, date, reference_number, amount, balance.

value_schema.description: Sort the payment list. Allowed Values: vendor_name, date, reference_number, amount and balance.

parameters.name: page_number_to_fetch
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to fetch. Default is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to fetch per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
